mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a statement issued by Robert Hutcheson of charges incurred by Andy. This includes passage to Liberia and seems to settle the balance of the account ($378.34). The document was witnessed by W. McLain, Fin. Sec. A. C. S. (American Colonization Society).
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Final Statement for Andy, April 19, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
Slavery
Slaves -- Emancipation
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
American Colonization Society
